nodes.text: If I get too close, someone might skewer me! I'd better stay back.
He gets a ten for resilience, and a minus twelve for personality.
Thereby ensuring that everyone else here thinks I'm a twit?
Hmmm... it's getting close to suppertime. No sense in exercising on an empty stomach - I might get cramps!
I am not going to waste my precious sleeping time exercising!
Avaunt ye! Or thee! Or whatever people say when they're attacking stuff!
This skinny blackguard is no match for me today!
How does this thing have better reflexes than me?
If this were a monster, I'd be eaten.
OW! My hand! I'd better not try that again, at least until I have a weapon equipped.
I've already shown these dummies who's the real dummy once today!
I've put this poor dummy through enough pain today.
I don't know how much more battering this dummy can take today, but that's all I can take.
Enough is enough. There's got to be something better to do right now than this.
No magic... which is a good thing. I think I'd get creeped out by these dummies if they were animated by magic.
